name: doctor-md
description: MD docs - markdown to html documentation generator
author: Dimitar Christoff <christoff@gmail.com> (https://twitter.com/D_mitar)

scripts.gen: ./bin/doctor -i README.md --title "Doctor, MD to HTML documentation generator for nodejs" -@ D_mitar -g https://github.com/DimitarChristoff/doctor --logo images/logo.png -a UA-1199722-4 -d doctor-md
